short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate data analysis and schedule AI-powered insights in Google Sheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Analyze and automate data insights within your Google Sheets using natural language. Whether it's Marketing, Product, Customer Success, Sales, Operations or Finance data, our user-friendly side panel provides valuable insights without ever leaving Google Sheets. You can also schedule recurring analyses to automate insights, keeping your data up-to-date with ease. Simplify and automate your data analysis process with this AI-powered analytics tool.

Installation
1. Click "Add to Chrome".
2. Click on the Octo extension icon in the top right corner of the browser.
3. Fill in your email to start the free trial.
4. Confirm your email address from your inbox.
